welcome.title: Welcome to
welcome.subtitle: DaffaFznnn
welcome.content: My name is Daffa. I live in Bandung, and I am an 18-year-old Software Engineering student at Assalaam Vocational High School. JavaScript is my favorite programming language.

content1.title: About me
content1.text: My full name is Muhammad Daffa Fauzan, I was born on December 4, 2005 in Bandung. I am the first child in my family, I also have one brother.
